comments:
I've tried with 3.1, 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 but the result is always the same. After the installation, the Eclipse startup procedure trashes with this .log:

!SESSION 2006-05-19 09:36:46.168 ----------------------------------------------
-
eclipse.buildId=M20060118-1600
java.version=1.4.2_10
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86

ava:376)
